author: cblecken
msg: Addressing the client data memory leak issues as for example in
AXISCPP-674. This was tested with a subset of the data types

author: samisa
msg: Included dlopen errors in addition to errno info

author: samisa
msg: Included the logic to have better error messages in case of errors on loading libs.

author: dicka
msg: Consolidate platform independent build properties into a single common property file.
Also initial work to support AIX 64bit, which highlighted this need for a common property file.
PR: AXISCPP-708 and initial work for supporting AIX 64bit

author: venkat
msg: Patch for AXIS-1992, as suggested by Ryan. Passes ant all-tests.
